attributes.comment:
As a single, employed taxpayer I have adopted 3 times internationally and am in
the process of completing a fourth adoption now. The increases proposed in this
rule are unreasonable and overly burdensome. My first adoption took place in
1996, the second in 1998-9, the third in 2002 and the fourth started in 2006 and I
hope to complete it this year. Each time the fees have been larger and each time
the timeframes have been longer for the exact same service. I have seen no
increase in the service level with the enormous increase in fees.

Please, please do not implement these increases!!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Heather A. Hall
